channel.title: Lumala on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Lumala on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 12 Nov 2021 00:00
item.description: The Lumala badly needed a set of new tyres and I didn’t quite have a tyre fixing kit. These two handy spoons were just what I needed to get the job done!
item.content:encoded: The Lumala badly needed a set of new tyres and I didn’t quite have a tyre fixing kit. These two handy spoons were just what I needed to get the job done!

item.title: 27 Oct 2021 00:00
item.description:
In a freak case of serendipity and perfect coincidence, I got to know earlier this week that my first owned geared bike was still very much standing in dusty glory in my Aunt’s garage. I bought the Lumala back in 2009 and it’s taken me several hundreds of miles on the western ghats. So many good memories!

Spent a good chunk of my free time during last week to revive it and I think I’m almost there!
item.content:encoded:
In a freak case of serendipity and perfect coincidence, I got to know earlier this week that my first owned geared bike was still very much standing in dusty glory in my Aunt’s garage. I bought the Lumala back in 2009 and it’s taken me several hundreds of miles on the western ghats. So many good memories!

Spent a good chunk of my free time during last week to revive it and I think I’m almost there!
